answers.answer: I think itching is associated with swelling atleast it was in my case....you need to drink LOTS of water thats what helped my swelling go down

Your blood pressure was OK?  I would try to get off your feet.I know towards the end, the skin can itch, especially on the belly from being stretched.  The itching isn't so concerning even though I'm sure it's terribly annoying but the swelling concerns me.  Swelling is a symptom of preeclampsia.  Have you notified your doc. of the swelling?  If not, you DEFINATELY need to call him/her and get checked.  Keep us posted.  Good luck.

Definitely, get that blood pressure checked.  I started getting hands and feet swelling and that accompanied by high blood pressure caused my Dr. concern about toxemia.  The blood panel came back fine, but we still did a c section at 36 weeks to be sure since the swelling was not going away.  Let us know!!!!

after the blood test, i was told that my liver was fine...hummmm! and my blood pressure was fine too. swelling is better and itching is a little bit better..still itches but not as much!i still feel like my doc didnt take me seriously ,telling me that all my sysmptoms are normal and that i worry too much for nothing!i know its not nothing, especially if it can be related to the blood being infected and stuff.thanks guys so much for the advise !!!xoxs

I'm glad you went to the doctor.  High blood pressure can be really scary.  I had a skin issue at the very beginning of this pregnancy where my skin HURT horribly bad.  They thought I had shingles and still say I had them but never broke out in actual shingles, just had the bad pain.  It was aweful so I totally feel for you.  At least you got everything checked out and know that you aren't dealing with preeclampsia.  Good luck

question: Girls..im itching so bad, i couldnt sleep..went to my obgyn...i was told to take benydril every 8 hrs...and they took blood samples to see how my liver is doing...the benydril hasnt hasnt done anything to me yet. it doesnt work!!and also im swelling on my hands and feet really bad...anyone knows what is going on with me and what to do with this situation?help!
title: Anyone itching all over ur body and swelling of hands and feet~ im so worried!!
